args: from polyaxon.polyaxonfile.local_runner import start_experiment_run; start_experiment_run('{"eval": {"data_pipeline": {"TFRecordImagePipeline": {"num_epochs": 1, "meta_data_file": "/plx/tmp/data/mnist/meta_data.json", "batch_size": 32, "data_files": ["/plx/tmp/data/mnist/mnist_eval.tfrecord"], "feature_processors": {"image": {"input_layers": ["image"], "layers": [{"Cast": "meta_data_file": "/tmp/plx/data/mnist/meta_data.json", "batch_size": 64, "data_files": ["/tmp/plx/data/mnist/mnist_train.tfrecord"], "feature_processors": {"image": {"input_layers": ["image"], "layers": [{"Cast": {"dtype": "float32", "inbound_nodes": ["image"], "name": "Cast_1"}}], "output_layers": ["Cast_1"]}}, "shuffle": true}}, "steps": 500}, "declarations": {"lr": 1.2589254117941673}, "project": {"name": "cats-vs-dogs"}, "settings": {"logging": {"path": "/tmp/plx/outputs/project1", "level": "INFO"}, "run_type": "minikube"}, "version": 1, "model": {"classifier": {"loss": {"SigmoidCrossEntropy": null}, "n_classes": 10, "graph": {"input_layers": ["image"], "layers": [{"Conv2D": {"kernel_size": 3, "inbound_nodes": ["image"], "name": "Conv2D_1", "filters": 32, "strides": 1, "regularizer": {"L2": {"l": 0.02}}, "activation": "elu"}}, {"MaxPooling2D": {"pool_size": 2, "inbound_nodes": ["Conv2D_1"], "name": "MaxPooling2D_1"}}, {"Conv2D": {"kernel_size": 3, "inbound_nodes": ["MaxPooling2D_1"], "name": "Conv2D_2", "filters": 64, "regularizer": {"L2": {"l": 0.02}}, "activation": "relu"}}, {"MaxPooling2D": {"pool_size": 2, "inbound_nodes": ["Conv2D_2"], {"learning_rate": 1.25892541179}}, "metrics": ["Accuracy", "Precision"], "one_hot_encode": true}}, "environment": {"n_ps": 1, "n_workers": 1, "delay_workers_by_global_step": true, "run_config": {"save_summary_steps": 100, "save_checkpoints_steps": 100}}}', '0', 'master', 0, 'train_and_evaluate')
